review_title: Finally found headphones which I like!
review_text: I have been searching for good headphones since months. Have tried JBL and Sennheiser wireless headphones (both in 8- 10,000 INR models). Have also tried Skullcandy Uproar wireless.Cassette wireless is one of the best headphones I have used till now.Compared to Skullcandy Uproar:  music volume as well as quality of Casette is better. It is also more sturdy and only a few hundred INR more in cost.Compared to Sennheiser: Cassette’s music quality is better. I had experienced that at loud volume, the Sennheiser headphones produced a high pitch which irritated ears. Skullcandy Cassette performs well even at high volume, does not irritate ears.Compared to JBL: I like Cassette’s music quality better- I find it to be clearer.

So since it is a Skullcandy, sound quality is on a bit musical side and has more bass. Fit is good and built quality is ok-ish but the ear cups are comfortable even they're on ear type. I received a damaged box but fortunately the headphones are good and working.

review_title: Finally This Are the headphones which I needed.
review_text: Earlier I was using Sony MDR XB450 and tried JBL tune 500Bt. JBL was not at all comfortable so I returned it. So I tried <U+0001F480>. This Headphones are the best compared to both. Bass is just Perfect. Cushions are very comfortable. You can use it for 3-4 hours easily without any pain on ears. Skullcandy will never let you down. If you are confused then go for it.

Ordered on 10th May got today #ShoutOutToAmazon. Coming to pros n consProsGood qualityComfortable (used for 3 hours non stop) no pain or discomfort.Can use like wired headphones (aux cable included)Value for moneyConsCan't find any as of now but will update if found any.Cheers to Skullcandy and Amazon!

The headphones are really great the cushions are soft and sound is amazing however for 2.9k headphones there's gotta be downsides and I feel they're very delicate and plus not water or dust resistant so keep that in mind
The clarity is missing big time..U can only feel the mids.. highs are lost somewhere and the lows are not that punchy...
Nice for music lover. Fully Satisfied

The right part of the headphone broke and so have temporarily used a sellotape to fix it. It's been barely 4 months since the date of purchase. I  have written to Skull candy but in vain. I'd suggest you look for better alternatives in this price range.

Not good for if you want to use it for longer duration. It causes ear pain.Other then it is ok.Before ordering it it was showing returnable. Now they are giving replacement. Bad thing is there is no return in this product. Stuck with bad choice.
Battery life is good on a single charge, sound quality is also good. Find it a bit uncomfortable for long use but not that much. I think you can buy one. Value for money.
All is perfect only the bad thing is when we use them the sound goes outside of the headphones
The product is defected and the mic doesn't work and the headphones do not connect to the bluetooth.
Stopped charging after 2 weeks of use
In this price no complaints
Had to return the product as bluetooth is not working after two days of use.
SUPERB PRODUCT. BATTERY BACK UP EXCELLENT
Amazing product from Skull Candy.The bass is stupendous.
Nice sound quality
Not able to connect through bluetooth to OnePlus 6T
